Hi [First Name],  
We noticed you opened our recent email ‚Äî thank you for staying connected! 
üôå But we think you might have missed the best part‚Ä¶  
üëâ [Big Benefit or Offer ‚Äî e.g., ‚ÄúGet 20% off your next order ‚Äî today only!‚Äù]  
We don‚Äôt want you to miss out ‚Äî just click below and grab your exclusive [deal / resource / upgrade].  
[CTA Button: ‚ÄúClaim Your Offer‚Äù]  Still not sure? We‚Äôre here to help if you have any questions. Just hit reply ‚Äî we love hearing from you!  Talk soon, [Your Name] [Your Company]
parameters.subject: Did you miss this? Here‚Äôs something special for you!

parameters.content:
## üéØ **üîπ SECTION 1: Schedule & Prepare Inputs**

### ‚úÖ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                             |
| ---- | -------------------------------- |
| ‚è∞    | **Daily Campaign Check Trigger** |
| ‚úèÔ∏è   | **Set Campaign Input Fields**    |

---

### üí° **What Happens Here**

* **‚è∞ Daily Campaign Check Trigger:**
  This node automatically **starts the workflow on a schedule** ‚Äî for example, every morning at 9‚ÄØAM.
  It makes sure you **don‚Äôt have to run it manually** every time. The goal is to check your email campaign performance **regularly and consistently**.

* **‚úèÔ∏è Set Campaign Input Fields:**
  This node **defines any input values** that your Agent needs.
  For example:

  * Campaign ID
  * ESP URL
  * Date range
  * Any dynamic variables

  It acts like **filling in a form** that the rest of the workflow will use.
  You can **edit it easily** without changing the whole workflow.

---

### üéØ **Why It‚Äôs Important**

‚úÖ Automates the whole thing on autopilot.
‚úÖ Ensures the Agent always has the **right data**.
‚úÖ Makes the workflow easy to maintain for non-tech users ‚Äî just change a value in **Edit Fields**, done!

---

---

## ü§ñ **üîπ SECTION 2: Scrape & Analyze with AI Agent**

### ‚úÖ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                                             |
| ---- | ------------------------------------------------ |
| ü§ñ   | **Agent: Scrape & Analyze Campaign Performance** |
| üß†   | **LLM: Summarize & Format**                      |
| üåê   | **Bright Data MCP: Scrape Report**               |
| üóÇÔ∏è  | **Parse Scrape Output**                          |

---

### üí° **What Happens Here**

* **ü§ñ Agent: Scrape & Analyze Campaign Performance**
  This is your **AI Agent** ‚Äî it does the smart part:

  * Talks to the **Bright Data MCP Tool** to scrape the ESP report page.
  * Uses an **LLM** (OpenAI Chat Model) to process the scraped data.
  * Passes the result to an **Output Parser** to turn messy text into clean, structured data.

* **üåê Bright Data MCP: Scrape Report**
  Bright Data logs in, navigates to your campaign report page, and **scrapes live open/click numbers**.

* **üß† LLM: Summarize & Format**
  The Chat Model turns raw scraped info into easy-to-read Markdown or JSON.
  This is like having a mini data analyst!

* **üóÇÔ∏è Parse Scrape Output**
  This node extracts the final numbers (open rate, CTR, bounces) so the logic can understand them.

---

### üéØ **Why It‚Äôs Important**

‚úÖ You don‚Äôt have to log in manually to get reports.
‚úÖ The AI cleans up messy scraped data.
‚úÖ Makes follow-up decisions possible without human effort.
‚úÖ Works for **any ESP** ‚Äî if the layout changes, just adjust the scraper.

---

---

## üìà **üîπ SECTION 3: Decide & Act Automatically**

### ‚úÖ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                                |
| ---- | ----------------------------------- |
| üîé   | **IF: Open ‚â•30% & CTR <10%?**       |
| üìß   | **Send Follow-Up Engagement Email** |
| üö´   | **Skip ‚Äî No Action Needed**         |

---

### üí° **What Happens Here**

* **üîé IF: Open ‚â•30% & CTR <10%?**
  This node checks:

  * Is the open rate good? (‚â•30%)
  * But is the click-through rate low? (<10%)
    If **true**, it triggers follow-up to re-engage the audience.

* **üìß Send Follow-Up Engagement Email**
  If the condition is true, this node sends a **personalized follow-up email** automatically.
  For example: ‚ÄúHey, you opened but didn‚Äôt click ‚Äî here‚Äôs your special offer!‚Äù

* **üö´ Skip ‚Äî No Action Needed**
  If the condition is **false** (e.g. CTR is healthy), do nothing. The workflow ends safely.

---

## üìà **üîπ SECTION 3: Decide & Act Automatically**

### ‚úÖ **Nodes in this Section**

| Node | Name                                |
| ---- | ----------------------------------- |
| üîé   | **IF: Open ‚â•30% & CTR <10%?**       |
| üìß   | **Send Follow-Up Engagement Email** |
| üö´   | **Skip ‚Äî No Action Needed**         |

---

### üí° **What Happens Here**

* **üîé IF: Open ‚â•30% & CTR <10%?**
  This node checks:

  * Is the open rate good? (‚â•30%)
  * But is the click-through rate low? (<10%)

* **üìß Send Follow-Up Engagement Email**
  If the condition is true, this node sends a **personalized follow-up email** automatically.

### üéØ **Why It‚Äôs Important**

‚úÖ Takes action **only when needed**, saving time.
‚úÖ Boosts click rates without extra manual work.
‚úÖ Protects your audience from spam by not sending unnecessary follow-ups.

---

## üåü **‚ú® Why This Whole Flow is Powerful**

* Runs daily ‚Äî **no manual checks**.
* Scrapes live data ‚Äî **no API? No problem!**
* Uses AI to process messy data ‚Äî **no coding required!**
* Makes smart decisions ‚Äî **no human micromanagement**.
* Sends the right email to the right audience at the right time ‚Äî **better engagement, better ROI!**

---
